Keyword.name: buffer
Keyword.hint: Allocate buffer on the GPU. \> buffer [name]

Keyword.name: csharp
Keyword.hint: Load C# assemplies. \> csharp [name]

Keyword.name: fragoutput
Keyword.hint: Fragment output object allow for the creation of \user-defined framebuffers. With them, one can render \to non-Default Framebuffer locations, and thus render \without disturbing the main screen. The fragment \shader is usually used to write to these objects. \> fragoutput [name]

Keyword.name: image
Keyword.hint: Similar to a texture, but are \accessed by compute commands. \> image [name]

Keyword.name: instance
Keyword.hint: Instantiate a class from a C# assembly. \> instance [name]

Keyword.name: pass
Keyword.hint: Define a rendering pass. \> pass [name]

Keyword.name: sampler
Keyword.hint: Define a sampler state. \> sampler [name]

Keyword.name: shader
Keyword.hint: Compile a GLSL shader. The shader_type annotation \specifies towards which shader stage this shader \should be compiled. \> shader [name] [shader_type]

Keyword.name: tech
Keyword.hint: Combines render basses into a rendering technique. \> tech [name]

Keyword.name: text
Keyword.hint: A text object only defines a string \that can be used by other object. \> text [name]

Keyword.name: texture
Keyword.hint: A texture contains one or more images that all have \the same pixel format. A texture can be used in two \ways. It can be the source of a texture access from \a Shader, or it can be used as a render target. \> texture [name]

Keyword.name: vertinput
Keyword.hint: Define a vertex input stream that can be used \by a rendering passes to process vertex information. \> vertinput [name]

Keyword.name: vertoutput
Keyword.hint: Defines a vertex output stream object used to \capture primitives generated by the vertex processing \step(s), recording data from those primitives into \buffer objects. This allows one to preserve the \post-transform rendering state of an object and \resubmit this data multiple times. \> vertoutput [name]

Keyword.name: vert
Keyword.hint: Vertex shader annotation. \ in int gl_VertexID \ in int gl_InstanceID \ out vec4 gl_Position \ out float gl_PointSize \ out float gl_ClipDistance[]

Keyword.name: tess
Keyword.hint: Tesselation control annotation. \ in int gl_PatchVerticesIn \ in int gl_PrimitiveID \ in int gl_InvocationID \ in vec4 gl_in[].gl_Position \ in float gl_in[].gl_PointSize \ in float gl_in[].gl_ClipDistance[] \ out float gl_TessLevelOuter[3] \ out float gl_TessLevelInner[3] \ out vec4 gl_out[].gl_Position \ out float gl_out[].gl_PointSize \ out float gl_out[].gl_ClipDistance[]

Keyword.name: eval
Keyword.hint: Tesselation evaluation shader annotation. \ in vec3 gl_TessCoord \ in int gl_PatchVerticesIn \ in int gl_PrimitiveID \ in float gl_TessLevelOuter[3] \ in float gl_TessLevelInner[1] \ in vec4 gl_in[].gl_Position \ in float gl_in[].gl_PointSize \ in float gl_in[].gl_ClipDistance[] \ out vec4 gl_Position \ out float gl_PointSize \ out float gl_ClipDistance[]

Keyword.name: geom
Keyword.hint: Geometry shader annotation. \ in int gl_PrimitiveIDIn \ in int gl_InvocationID \ in vec4 gl_in[].gl_Position \ in float gl_in[].gl_PointSize \ in float gl_in[].gl_ClipDistance[] \ out int gl_PrimitiveID \ out int gl_Layer \ out int gl_ViewportIndex \ out vec4 gl_Position \ out float gl_PointSize \ out float gl_ClipDistance[]

Keyword.name: frag
Keyword.hint: Fragment shader annotation. \ in vec4 gl_FragCoord \ in bool gl_FrontFacing \ in vec2 gl_PointCoord \ in int gl_SampleID \ in vec2 gl_SamplePosition \ in int gl_SampleMaskIn[] \ in float gl_ClipDistance[] \ in int gl_PrimitiveID \ in int gl_Layer \ in int gl_ViewportIndex \ out float gl_FragDepth \ out int gl_SampleMask[]

Keyword.name: comp

Keyword.hint: Disables the depth test.

Keyword.hint: To pass the depth test the new depth value must be greater.

Keyword.hint: To pass the depth test the new depth value must be less.

Keyword.hint: To pass the depth test the new depth value must be equal.

Keyword.name: location

Keyword.name: component
